document_data.name: The Studious Mamluk Society
document_data.mainbody: The '''Studious Mamluk Society''', also known as the '''Studious''', was a military organization in [[Zakhara]].{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|22}}
document_data.Activities: Contrary to most of the [[mamluk]] organizations in Zakhara, the Studious focused on espionage and communication.
document_data.Organization: The Studious were led by General [[Okin Abd al-Talib'ilm]].
document_data.Base of Operations: Qudra was the base of operations for the Studious. They also operated in [[Huzuz]], [[Wasat]], and [[Utaqa]].
